// this file contains the formatting for:
// the main documentation book when built as a whole
// included at the start of the main .adoc file 
// directly after local formatting with NO blank lines in this include
// No blanks between "= title" and this include
// set the book flag so that chapter know they are part of something larger
:flag-book: true
// Set data-uri to embed images in output
:data-uri:
:allow-uri-read:
// toc placement - disable auto TOC, use manual placement with toc::[] macro
:toc: macro
:toclevels: 4
:sectnums:
:sectnumlevels: 5
// Set source highlighter and style
:source-highlighter: rouge
:rouge-style: github
// set HTML formatting options
:icons: font
// set PDF formatting options
:pdf-page-size: A4
:pdf-theme: custom
:pdf-fontsdir: fonts/
//:pdf-style: theme.yml
// set PDF title page with laser warning logo
// Laser warning symbol (DIN 4844-2) by Torsten Henning, public domain via Wikimedia Commons
:title-logo-image: image:includes/laser-warning.svg[align=center,pdfwidth=50%]
ifdef::backend-html5[]
:toc: right
//:stylesheet: custom.css
//favicon (inline base64)
:favicon: data:image/x-icon;base64,
endif::backend-html5[]
